title: Drawing, Cross section of church of S. Tommaso da Villanova, ca. 1655–67
title_raw: Cross section of church of S. Tommaso da Villanova
medium: pencil, pen, and bistre ink on paper
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund
description: Cross section of a church with a cupola, S. Tommaso da Villanova at Castelgandolfo. The altar with the frame of an oval painting supported by angels. Above the entablature the star and mountains, charges of the coat of arms of Pope Alexander VII. Two evangelists sitting upon clouds. On the roof, at right, the bell gables.

tombstone.epitaph: Drawing, Cross section of church of S. Tommaso da Villanova, ca. 1655–67. pencil, pen, and bistre ink on paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund. 1938-88-3816.
